snippet: The Giants’ defense was only partly successful at playing less “soft” against the Saints — the group had four key turnovers and two red zone stops.
abstract: New York Giants defense has four key turnovers and two red zone stops in victory against New Orleans Saints, but still shows room for improvement.
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ defense was only partly successful at playing less “soft” against the Saints — the group had four key turnovers and two red zone stops.

headline.seo: Giants’ Defense ‘Nastier’ but Still Room to Improve
headline.main: Big Plays on Defense, but Still Room for Improvement
headline.print_headline: Big Plays on Defense, but Still Room for Improvement
